subject: Boxing
organizations: World Boxing Association and International Boxing Federation
lead_paragraph: Wladimir Klitschko stopped Jean-Marc Mormeck of France in the fourth round of a one-sided fight to retain his World Boxing Association and International Boxing Federation heavyweight titles.
snippet: Wladimir Klitschko stopped Jean-Marc Mormeck of France in the fourth round of a one-sided fight to retain his World Boxing Association and International Boxing Federation heavyweight titles.
